name: Germ Warfare 2020
description:
A fast-paced shoot-em-up where it's you versus the germs!

In active development.

How to play:

Shoot all the germs. Boxes sometimes have goodies.  Avoid the bombs and tank-tacks.

Controls:

Slow down/Speed Up: A/D

Jump: Space

Aim: Mouse

Fire: Left Mouse Button

Pause: Esc
